docs.title: 👋 About Jinja UI
docs.text: Jinja UI is an open-source UI component library built using Jinja2 templating system.

docs.title: 🔍 Description
docs.text: A reusable UI component system powered by Jinja2.

docs.title: 👤 Author
docs.text:
